title: The Caged Omega -Bound By Love-
alternative_title: Kago no Naka no Ω Yasashisugiru Sokubaku ; 籠の中のΩ
status: Kago no Naka no Ω Yasashisugiru Sokubaku ; 籠の中のΩ
description:
Description :
        "Are you really my boyfriend?"Omegaverse with an Omega who's lost his memory, confined alone with a silent, obsessive Alpha.Aya, an Omega, loses his memory in a traffic accident.When he regains consciousness, he is taken in by Haruto, an Alpha doctor who stays by his side.Haruto says that they were in a romantic relationship, but Aya can't remember anything.When the two of them return home, he suddenly begins to experience heat symptoms.As Aya desperately searches for a suppressant,Haruto slowly pushes him down from behind"You don't have to take it," he says, covering Aya's mouth with a kiss. Then, as Aya goes fully into heat, he passionately embraces Aya's throbbing body...
